main event: Military personnel reported sightings of unidentified aerial phenomena in the Southwest United States during July to August 1949, describing a clear bright light moving in the sky.
interesting points: Observers reported the object appeared as bright as the evening star., The object was noted to have a bluish green color and a round shape., It was described as moving very fast and fading out rather suddenly., Several observers claimed to have seen the object while driving or in outdoor locations with unobstructed views., The military classified the sightings as 'astro' indicating they were identified as fireballs or meteors.
witness description: Military personnel including corporals and lieutenants who were engaged in various duties.
